post.author: pbmax
post.body:
supposedly there will be a press conference today showing off the body. hoax!?!

hey, if its on foxnews, it must be true- right?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D0v2Xp_odwQ

post.author: Alternate
post.body:
Fox news lost all of it's respect after they made a document about Anonymous and "Hackers on steroids".

It gave me good lulz but still.. I wouldn't trust them in everything.

post.author: CrimsonHead
post.body: This is the sign prophesised in the books of B'truger vol. 9 appendix c, the time is now my minions! mankind will perish. muhwaaa hahaha

post.author: BNA!
post.body: The last time I saw a person blink so often was Saddam Hussein during the later stages of Gulf War 1 on TV interviews.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body:
BNA! wrote:
The last time I saw a person blink so often was Saddam Hussein during the later stages of Gulf War 1 on TV interviews.

My thoughts exactly! This bullshit is one of the reasons why I don't watch tv.

post.author: KoRnScythe
post.body: It looks like one of those ape costumes, like the one off of Spongebob Squarepants. I smell (depending on how long they were used and how much the person wearing them was sweating) several barrels and truck loads of cow crap. Also, note the happy, cuddly smile it's giving, seeing as how the hillbillies that found him were a little behind in anatomy of the human ancestor. Science is cool.

post.author: Argoon
post.body:
If this is fake, them they are risking to much, having a video is one thing no one can touch it, but a body is another thing. Lets wait some more days and see what comes out of this. afaik they will give a conference tomorrow and show ADN prof.

If this is true man.

post.author: Bittoman
post.body: I'm sure it's not much difference than the Alien Autopsy video that came out some 10-15 years ago. It might make for some half-decent entertainment but everyone will be keeping their mouth's shut until someone finally admits "Yeah, I doctored that up" and then gets hired by some makeup and art studio.

post.author: pbmax
post.body:
its gonna be a hoax, me thinks.

after all these years, population growth, urban sprawl, campers, hikers and explorers, somebody would have come up with proof by now...

post.author: zeh
post.body:
Debunked a few days ago, actually.
http://bfro.net/hoax.asp

post.author: kit89
post.body:
Fox report wrote:
Evidence that big foot does exist


Wouldn't that not be did exist?

How can you even believe what that news station is saying? It's so pathetically cheesy.
